AboutUs.title: About
AboutUs.text1: Purpie is an open-source social-media platform and a content creation tool rolled into one. You can create meetings, upload videos, share and record your video content, all through Purpie. It is created by the team behind Doganbros and their over 20 years of experience in the field of multi-media delivery.
AboutUs.text2: About 8 years ago, two brothers joined together to create Doganbros, with a vision to create a software workshop, combining the personal feel of freelance developers and the professionalism of large outsourcing companies.
AboutUs.text3: While they worked on the projects they took under, the idea for a platform combining their talents started to form. A toolbox for content creators, where they start, record and publish their live feeds or upload videos. A flexible hub they can either make use of directly, or connect with an API. With tools to aid publishing and monetizing their creation. This idea became Purpie

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.text1: Doganbros operates the purpie.io website, which provides the SERVICE. This page is used to inform website visitors regarding our policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use our Service, the Purpie website.
PrivacyPolicy.text2: If you choose to use our Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation with this policy. The Personal Information that we collect is used for providing and improving the Service. We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.
PrivacyPolicy.text3: The terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions, which is accessible at purpie.io, unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy.
PrivacyPolicy.description1: For a better experience while using our Service, we may require you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information, including but not limited to your name, email address and job title. The information that we collect will be used to contact or identify you.
PrivacyPolicy.description2: We want to inform you that whenever you visit our Service, we collect information that your browser sends to us that is called Log Data. This Log Data may include information such as your computer’s Internet Protocol ("IP") address, browser version, pages of our Service that you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on those pages, and other statistics.
PrivacyPolicy.description31: Cookies are files with a small amount of data that is commonly used as an anonymous unique identifier. These are sent to your browser from the website that you visit and are stored on your computer’s hard drive.
PrivacyPolicy.description32: Our website uses these "cookies" to collect information and to improve our Service. You have the option to either accept or refuse these cookies, and know when a cookie is being sent to your computer. If you choose to refuse our cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our Service.
PrivacyPolicy.description41: We may employ third-party companies and individuals due to the following reasons:
PrivacyPolicy.description41ListItem2: To provide the Service on our behalf;
PrivacyPolicy.description41ListItem4: To assist us in analyzing how our Service is used.
PrivacyPolicy.description42: We want to inform our Service users that these third parties have access to your Personal Information. The reason is to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are obligated not to disclose or use the information for any other purpose.
PrivacyPolicy.description5: We value your trust in providing us your Personal Information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember that no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
PrivacyPolicy.description6: Our Service may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. Note that these external sites are not operated by us. Therefore, we strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites. We have no control over, and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.
PrivacyPolicy.description7: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, we advise you to review this page periodically for any changes. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. These changes are effective immediately, after they are posted on this page.
PrivacyPolicy.description8: If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to <0>contact us</0>.

TermsAndConditions.text3: By accessing this website we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue to use Purpie if you do not agree to take all of the terms and conditions stated on this page.
TermsAndConditions.text4: The following terminology applies to these Terms and Conditions, Privacy Statement and Disclaimer Notice and all Agreements: "Client", "You" and "Your" refers to you, the person log on this website and compliant to the Company’s terms and conditions. "The Company", "Ourselves", "We", "Our" and "Us", refers to our Company. "Party", "Parties", or "Us", refers to both the Client and ourselves. All terms refer to the offer, acceptance and consideration of payment necessary to undertake the process of our assistance to the Client in the most appropriate manner for the express purpose of meeting the Client’s needs in respect of provision of the Company’s stated services, in accordance with and subject to, prevailing law of Turkey. Any use of the above terminology or other words in the singular, plural, capitalization and/or he/she or they, are taken as interchangeable and therefore as referring to same.

Purpie.io does not filter, edit, publish or review Comments prior to their presence on the website. Comments do not reflect the views and opinions of Purpie.io,its agents and/or affiliates. Comments reflect the views and opinions of the person who post their views and opinions. To the extent permitted by applicable laws, Purpie.io shall not be liable for the Comments or for any liability, damages or expenses caused and/or suffered as a result of any use of and/or posting of and/or appearance of the Comments on this website.

TermsAndConditions.description32: These organizations may link to our home page, to publications or to other Website information so long as the link: (a) is not in any way deceptive; (b) does not falsely imply sponsorship, endorsement or approval of the linking party and its products and/or services; and (c) fits within the context of the linking party’s site.

TermsAndConditions.description34: We will approve link requests from these organizations if we decide that: (a) the link would not make us look unfavorably to ourselves or to our accredited businesses; (b) the organization does not have any negative records with us; (c) the benefit to us from the visibility of the hyperlink compensates the absence of Purpie.io; and (d) the link is in the context of general resource information.

TermsAndConditions.description10: Accounts on this site can be anonymized or deleted at the user’s request. Contact us at support@purpie.io for details.

Faq.a1: A zone is the base for creating channels, which means a channel would always belong to a Zone. Conceptually, Channels having similar contents would exist in the same Zone. This similarity can be based on content type, content source or any other categorization. Following key points should be in consideration while interacting with Zones:
Faq.a1ListItem1: Zones can be private or public.
Faq.a1ListItem2: Users can not share content directly from a Zone.
Faq.a1ListItem3: Private Zones can only be accessed by the Zone members.
Faq.a1ListItem4: Public Zones are open to other Purpie users.
Faq.a1ListItem5: Users can join existing public Zones in Purpie and join Private Zones only through invites.
Faq.a1ListItem6: A user can create a Channel inside a Zone if they are the Zone owner or if given a role that has permissions to create Channels by the Zone owner.
Faq.a2:
Users can create and share content from a Channel, which is always under a Zone. So, the Channel is where you publish your content and let others view it.
Following key points should be in consideration while interacting with Channels:
Faq.a2ListItem1: Channels can be private or public.
Faq.a2ListItem2: Users can share content from a Channel (also from their Profile but we will come to that later).
Faq.a2ListItem3: Private Channels can only be accessed by the Channel followers.
Faq.a2ListItem4: Public Channels are open to other Purpie users.
Faq.a2ListItem5: Users can follow existing public Channels and join private Channels only through invites.
Faq.a2ListItem6: Users can create content inside a Channel only if they are the Channel owner or if given a role that has permissions to create content by the Channel owner.
Faq.q3: How can I start creating content?
Faq.a3: To create content, the only thing you need to have is a profile in Purpie.
Faq.a41: You can create content directly from under your profile. In which case, that content is only visible to your contacts.
Faq.a42: If you want to reach a broader audience, you should create a Channel of your own. A Channel's content can be either private or public. Former means the content is only shared with the other members of the Channel, while the latter means it is visible to everyone.
Faq.q5: Do I need anything special to use Purpie?
Faq.a5: All you need is an internet-capable device, like a smart phone or a computer, and an internet connection.
Faq.q6: How can I setup Purpie for myself?
Faq.a6: You can find more info on a quick install here. If you want a more advanced guide, you can find a way to set your Purpie of from scratch here.
Faq.q7: Is there a community for Purpie?
Faq.a7: Yes! Purple supports a burgeoning community in <0>community.purpie.org</0>. Also, don’t forget to check out our website, <1>purpie.org</1>.
